/** * These Unit-tests will check all possible extremes when using some rounding-methods of DateUtils. * The extremes are tested at the switch-point in milliseconds * * According to the implementation SEMI_MONTH will either round/truncate to the 1st or 16th * When rounding Calendar.MONTH it depends on the number of days within that month. * A month with 28 days will be rounded up from the 15th * A month with 29 or 30 days will be rounded up from the 16th * A month with 31 days will be rounded up from the 17th * * @author Robert Scholte * @since 3.0 * */
// TODO: Add DateUtils.ceil()-tests if method is available
